public interface EventBus

Dispatches Events to registered handlers

addHandler

<T extends Event> HandlerRegistration addHandler(Handler<T> handler)
Register a handler for events of type T

Parameters:
handler - the handler to register
Returns:
a HandlerRegistration that can be used to unregister the handler

addHandlerToSource

                                                         Object source)
Register a handler for events of type T dispatched from source source

Parameters:
handler - the handler to register
source - the source that fired the event
Returns:
a HandlerRegistration that can be used to unregister the handler
